definition: chakra
see 脈脈|脉脉[mo4 mo4]
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
old variant of 脈|脉[mai4]
variant of 脈|脉[mai4]
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: Then you see the chakra spinning open clockwise down into the earth.
sentences.chinese: 然后你看着脉轮顺时针旋转打开，放大至大地。

sentences.english: The first chakra holds the fear of survival or not having enough.
sentences.chinese: 第一个脉轮持有你对幸存或不够丰饶的担心恐惧。

sentences.english: I choose to spin the chakras at a synchronistic timing that is even and balanced.
sentences.chinese: 我选择以一个均匀平衡的同步定时来旋转脉轮。

sentences.english: Unless this is opened sufficiently, the energy cannot flow into the other chakras .
sentences.chinese: 除非这个脉轮被充分打开，能量就不能流入其他脉轮。

sentences.english: Unless this is opened sufficiently, the energy cannot flow into the other chakras .
sentences.chinese: 除非这个脉轮被充分打开，能量就不能流入其他脉轮。

sentences.english: There are 72000 such nadis spread over the entire kosha. There are also many prominent energy distribution centers called Chakras.
sentences.chinese: 还有许多称为脉轮的主要的能量分布中心。

sentences.english: Then your seventh chakra is your crown chakra.
sentences.chinese: 然后到你的第七个脉轮，顶轮。

sentences.english: These hand placements are coordinated to the seven major chakras and the endocrine system.
sentences.chinese: 这些手位和人体的七个主要脉轮及内分泌系统相对应。

sentences.english: Let us next focus on the root chakra, which sits at the tailbone.
sentences.chinese: 接下来让我们聚焦在位于尾骨的根部脉轮。

sentences.english: It is the occipital chakra that governs and directs the energy flow of the dream of the Bodhisattva.
sentences.chinese: 正是枕骨脉轮，管辖并引导着菩萨级别梦想的能量流。

sentences.english: The heart chakra is the dreamtime of non-conditional love.
sentences.chinese: 心脏脉轮是无条件爱的梦想时间层。

definition: mūlādhāra or muladhara, the root or Saturn chakra 查克拉, residing in the coccyx
sahasrāra or sahasrara, the crown or fontanel chakra 查克拉, residing at the top of the skull
manipūra or manipura, the solar plexus chakra 查克拉, residing in the upper abdomen
viśuddha or visuddha, the throat chakra 查克拉, residing in the neck
ājñā or ajna, the brow or third eye chakra 查克拉, residing in the forehead/also written 眉間輪|眉间轮[mei2 jian1 lun2]
anāhata or anahata, the heart chakra 查克拉, residing in the chest
svādhisthāna or svadhisthana, the navel or libido chakra 查克拉, residing in the genitals
solar plexus chakra
ājñā or ajna, the brow or third eye chakra 查克拉, residing in the forehead
to visualize (Buddhist practice)
solar plexus chakra
to heal/therapy
energy channels/meridian (TCM)/(dialect) trick/tactic
to meditate/meditation
astrology
hidden inner properties and their external manifestations (TCM)
